text: Christian media is a genre that exists throughout media formats including music, movies, radio, and books. Christianity has a long history of Christian art. Christian stories are based around the teachings of Jesus and the Bible. Most things that are in the Christian genre are popular with both Christians and people who are not Christian. == Examples == *Christian Broadcasting Network *The Pilgrim's Progress *VeggieTales *Christian music **Christian rock **Gospel music ==Related pages== * People's Television Network * Intercontinental Broadcasting Corporation * DWET-TV * DWNB-TV * DWVN-DTV * BBC * CCTV Category:Mass media
title: Christian media
